scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, depicted in profile, is shown with his hands clasped in prayer. He wears a green garment over a red robe. He is enclosed within a circular, illuminated initial, which is bordered by decorative elements. The background within the initial is a deep blue with scattered white dots, suggesting a celestial or starry sky. A golden halo surrounds his head, indicating his sanctity. The overall scene is highly stylized and appears to be part of a larger illuminated manuscript.
